title: Recamán's Sequence
description: In this coding challenge, I visualize the Recamán’s number sequence using the p5.js library and go on to generate a series of musical tones using p5.js sound.

timestamps.title: Introduction!
Discussing the Recamán's Sequence
Starting to code and adding the prerequisites to generate the sequence
Writing the algorithm to generate the numbers of the sequence
Testing the algorithm
Adding the counter
Visualizing the algorithm!
Making continuous series of arcs instead of ellipses
An exercise to pause and try for yourself!
Creating an Arc class and an array of arcs
Scaling down the animation as we move along the Recamán's Sequence
Scaling down by the biggest number in the sequence generated so far
Explore the Recamán's Sequence and share your works!
Welcome to the second part of the challenge!
Creating an oscillator using the p5.js sound library
Using the numbers of the Recamán's Sequence as the frequency of the oscillator
Thinking of the numbers of the sequence as keys of a piano!
Creating an envelope using the p5.js sound library
Restricting the frequency range
Conclusion!
